name: Real Estate Client Intake Form
description: A dynamic, mobile-first intake form for real estate agents to efficiently capture new client information for buyers, sellers, or both, now with AI-powered voice input.

src: flex flex-col sm:flex-row space-y-3 sm:space-y-0 sm:space-x-6
h-5 w-5 bg-gray-700 border-gray-600 text-cyan-500 focus:ring-cyan-600
grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 mt-2
fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-gray-900/80 backdrop-blur-sm p-4 z-10

w-full bg-cyan-500 hover:bg-cyan-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-4 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-300 text-lg shadow-cyan-500/50 shadow-lg disabled:bg-gray-600 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:shadow-none flex items-center justify-center
Client's role: Seller, Buyer, or Both.
Set to true if a co-client is mentioned.
Information about where the client lead came from.
Name of the person who referred this client.
Set to true if sending a referral gift was mentioned.
The type of gift to send, if mentioned.
Details related to the client selling a property.
How soon the client wants to sell.
Current staging status of the property.
Estimated date for the property to go 'live' on the market (YYYY-MM-DD format).
Status of property photography. Can be multiple values.
Date scheduled for photography (YYYY-MM-DD format), if applicable.
A summary of the home's key features.
A list of property-specific documents that are needed.
If 'Other' is mentioned for property docs, specify the details here.
Instructions for showing the property to potential buyers.
Set to true if an RBFCU rebate is applicable.
The client's preferred title team (free text).
General notes about the seller or property.
Details related to the client buying a property.
How soon the client wants to buy.
Is the client local or relocating?
Client's budget or price range, e.g., '$500k - $600k'.
Specific areas, neighborhoods, or cities the client is interested in.
Ideal closing date for the purchase (YYYY-MM-DD format).
The name of the lender the client is working with, if any.
General notes about the buyer's needs.
Failed to parse transcript. The AI response may have been invalid.
bg-gray-900/80 backdrop-blur-sm sticky top-0 z-10 py-4 px-4 md:px-8 shadow-lg shadow-cyan-500/10 mb-8
